code: import cleanArray from"utils/cleanArray";import reduceBrackets from"utils/reduceBrackets";var MOVE_VIEW=function MOVE_VIEW(grid,action){var dragged=action.dragged,to=action.to,pos=action.pos,vertical=action.vertical;var stringGrid=JSON.stringify(grid).replace(/\s/,"").replace("\"".concat(dragged,"\""),"$from").replace("\"".concat(to,"\""),"$to");if(pos==="center"){stringGrid=stringGrid.replace("$from","\"".concat(to,"\"")).replace("$to","\"".concat(dragged,"\""));return JSON.parse(stringGrid);}stringGrid=stringGrid.replace("$from","null");var newGrid=[];if(pos==="left"||pos==="top")newGrid=[dragged,to];else newGrid=[to,dragged];if(vertical&&(pos==="left"||pos==="right")||!vertical&&(pos==="top"||pos==="bottom"))newGrid=[newGrid];stringGrid=stringGrid.replace("$to",JSON.stringify(newGrid));grid=cleanArray(JSON.parse(stringGrid));return reduceBrackets(grid);};export default MOVE_VIEW;
